summary: Pokemon Card of the Day #1507: Virizion (Emerging Powers)
title: Pokemon Card of the Day #1507: Virizion (Emerging Powers)
body:
Virizion, at first glance, looked like another one of those Pokemon that ended up getting in its own way. Sure, there was an attack that could dish out 100 for 3 Energy, but it couldn’t be used 2 turns in a row. Why bother with that? Well, Virizion was a Grass-type, and while that wasn’t the most common Weakness out there, there was one very specific Pokemon that was very common in the HGSS-On format and had a strategy revolving around tanking hits and dishing them out better than an opponent could. Maybe being able to smash through a dangerous Pokemon like that in one hit was enough to consider Virizion after all.

100 HP was really nice for a Basic Pokemon. To be fair, there were plenty that hit higher totals with all of the other legends in the Black & White era, but it was a high enough number to take a hit from the likes of Terrakion, which was really what you were using this for. The Fire Weakness didn’t mean much. Reshiram might have been able to save on Energy discards if weakened a bit and Ho-Oh EX had an easier time but that was about it. The -20 Water Resistance helped out against Vanilluxe, Empoleon, and even Keldeo EX if you were using this in later formats. Needing only an Energy to retreat was good for a Pokemon that needed to switch out rather often.

Giga Drain wasn’t too good. 30 damage for 2 Energy wasn’t going to cut it even if Virizion was healed by the same amount of damage done to the Defending Pokemon. It was simply too weak.

Sacred Sword was powerful but came with a catch. It was hard to ignore an attack that could do 100 for 2 Grass and a Colorless Energy. That was impressive. The problem was that Sacred Sword couldn’t be used during your next turn, so Virizion couldn’t be a main attacker. It found its role by being an occasional backup in CMT decks, using Celebi Prime to get Grass Energy. Virizion wasn’t used all that often even in that deck, since its job was to screw over Terrakion decks and CMT was still solid against those, but if you expected a lot of Terrakion where you were, Virizion could be a very nice choice.

Virizion had a very small spot in the game. Being a backup attacker for a good deck was a nice spot, at least. It was best in the HGSS-On format, and the more popular Lightning- and Darkness-types were in an area the better Virizion would be. Lightning- and Darkness-types tended to be followed by a surge in Terrakion decks that Virizion feasted on. If those weren’t popular, Virizion was left on the sidelines. It was an interesting situation and guessing right about what decks would be most popular was key to using this card well.

summary: Hi! I saw your post about having the urge to write something shippy but not being sure about what you have yet to see in the...
question: Hi! I saw your post about having the urge to write something shippy but not being sure about what you have yet to see in the series? One thing you could do is write an "insert scene" for an episode you've already seen and like! Something you could imagine may have happened while the plot focus was on the brat kids, you know?
answer:
Thanks for the idea! I should definitely think of something like that, I’d love to do maybe some continuation after another blast off or something ^-^

I can think of a few generic ideas, however I don’t really have any specific episodes in mind since idk I love them all?? If anyone has some suggestions let me know, I’d be happy to try working with requests too!

summary: Mia@both i guess??"Sorry for ease dropping i didn't mean to but i over heard something about koi fish... What about koi...
question: Mia@both i guess??"Sorry for ease dropping i didn't mean to but i over heard something about koi fish... What about koi fascinates u so?"
answer:
“Well, they’re very pretty for starters! They come in all these colors and each one is different!”

“But more importantly… look at the water.”

She turns her head to look at the pond.

“Koi are a symbol of harmony to me. The way they swim, everything is in order. It’s so peaceful. So flowing. So beautiful…” 

“They are quite relaxing to watch. They help me return to a peaceful state when I’m worried about something.”

[ @askfusionfriends ]

summary: Digital art of my shiny leafeon from Pokemon Sun. His name is Muffin because the little puff of fur around eevee's neck reminded...
body: Digital art of my shiny leafeon from Pokemon Sun. His name is Muffin because the little puff of fur around eevee’s neck reminded me of one. The design is based off a serval because its rounded face and big ears were similar to a leafeon, plus I love cats!

tags: I love writing these stories omfg
Eventually I’ll start writing for other ships BUT
I LOVE THESE TWO THE MOST ASKSJSKSBDBDK
body:
Tickle fic bingo:

#2 Surprise tickling:

“Alright Pikachu! Iron tail! Talonflame, Flame charge!” Ash exclaimed, pumped up during his early training session.

“Pika! Pikachu!”

“Tal! Flame!”

Clemont was coming out to tell Ash to come inside for dinner. “Hey! Ash! Come on! I’ve got dinner almost ready!”

Ash didn’t hear him. He was way into his training to notice him talking.

“Ash?” He realized he wasn’t listening. “Aaaaaaash!”

He still wasn’t paying any bit of attention.

“Now Pikachu! I want you to use thunderbolt!”

-______-

Clemont rolled his eyes and went back to the house to finish their dinner, after about ten minutes he came back out and yelled for his boyfriend again.

“Hey Ash! It’s time to eat!”

“Talonflame! Use brave bird! Carefully now, don’t get hurt!”

Clemont had enough of yelling, but he tried one more time. “ASH! Time to eat!! Wrap it up!! You and your Pokemon need to eat!”

This time Ash heard him. “Oh! Okay Clem! Be in in a minute!”

Relieved, he went back inside and waited for him. But after another 15 minutes, he stormed back outside to see him still training.

“Dammit, Ash..” He huffed.

Ash does this all of the time. He tires himself and his Pokemon out just about every day training.

Clemont had enough. If he wasn’t going to come in, he’ll make him. He snuck up behind his boyfriend.

“Pikachu, let’s try electro ball against Talonflame’s Ariel ace!”

“Pika!!”

“Tal Tal!”

“Awesome! You guys keep it u-HAHAHAHA!!!”

Pikachu and Talonflame stopped battling and watched as Ash squirmed in Clemont’s arms as he tickled him.

“CLEHEHEHEMENT WHAT THE HEHEHEHELL?! HAHAHAHAHA!!! LET ME GOHOHOHO!”

He smirked. “No! You decided not to listen! You’ve been out here for 3 hours! You and your Pokemon need to eat!”

“I wahahahahahahas gonna cohohohome in Ihihihin a mihihihihinute!!!”

“Too long!” Clemont laughed. “Now face the consequences of your actions, love!”

“Ahahahahahahaha-! *snort* Clemont plehehehehease stop!!” He fell backwards on top of his boyfriend.

“Wha- h-hey-!”

They both fell, Ash was now on top of him. Grinning at him.

“Ash. No. Don’t you dare.”

“Ohoho.. But why not? That was a big mistake babe.. *poke*

“Nohohohoho-!” He squealed.

Ash smirked. Yes!” He dug into his sides.

“HAHAHAHAHAHA ASH NOHOHOHOHO!!! THIHIHIS WAS YOUR PUHUHUHUNISHMENT!”

“Not anymore! Tickle tickle tickle! Gitchi gitchi goo!” He taunted.

“S-STOP!” He screamed, squirming uncontrollably. “I’M SORRYEEHEHEE!!”

Ash stopped, helping the giggling nerd up.

“Alright, let’s go eat, babe. Pikachu! Talonflame! Come on! Time to eat!”

They all headed into the house and they ate. Afterwards, Ash spent an hour training some more. Then it was time for bed. Ash was in the bathroom brushing his teeth.

Clemont wanted revenge, so after he got dressed for bed, he snuck to the bathroom and attacked his boyfriend.

“HEY- CLEM- oof!”

He pinned him down to the floor.

“Babe please.. I’m sorry for tickling you. But you deserved it! Please have mercy on me!”

He shook his head. “You’re so cute. That’s not happening.” He shoved his tickling fingers up to his armpits.

“WAIT- NO- HAHAHAHAHAHAHAA!!!! CLEMONT NO!!! NOHOHHOOT THEEEEERE-!”

“Tickle tickle tickle tickle tickle-“

Ash wiggled and squirmed helplessly trying to get away from him. “CLEMONT IM GOING TO KIHIHIHILL YOUUHOOHOHOOHOO!!”

“Awww that’s not nice. You love me too much.” He giggled, getting his neck. “You ticklish here?”

“HAHAHA-! NO!” He tried to cover his neck. “CLEMMY PLEASE! I’LL DO ANYTHING!!”

“Anything?”

“YEHEHEHEES ANYTHIHIHING HAHAHAHA-!”

Clemont grinned. “Then next time, when I call for you guys to come take a break, you have got to listen. I don’t want you all to go too far and exhaust yourselves.”

“OKAYOKAYOKAY-!”

“Also..”

“OHOHOHOHO MY GOD CLEMONT YOURE SOHOHOHO DEHEHEEHEAD!”

“No training tomorrow. Your Pokemon rest, while you and I have the day to ourselves. Deal?”

Ash squealed. “Y-YES DEHEHEHEEHEEAL!!!”

Clemont stopped tickling and kissed his cheek. “Now that wasn’t so hard, was it? Revenge is sweet.” He laughed.

As he walked and got into bed, Ash was still on the floor, panting.

“Ash? You coming?”

“Y-Yeah.. after I’m done dying…” He joked, still trying to catch his breath.

“Oh, come up here you big baby.” He laughed.

Ash rose up. “What did you just call me..?” A smirk appearing on his face.

Clemont just made a mistake. He hid in the covers. “I-I- didn’t say anything! Goodnight babe-!”

“Ohhhhhhhh no! Now you’ve done it! C’mere!!” He jumped into bed, grabbing his boyfriend trying to wiggle away from him and started to tickle him mercilessly.

“NO NO NO NO NO PLEASE ASH!! HAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!! I’M SORRYEEHEE!! PLEHEHEHEASE DOHOHOHON’T!”

Ash trapped him in his arms, he tickled him slower, but still wringing our adorable giggles from Clemont.

“S-Stop!” He squirmed in his arms.

“No. Not until you take it back.” He teased.

“Nohoho!”

“Okay you brat.. you wanna play like that? C’mere!” He pinned him down and tickled his stomach, poking him repeatedly.

“OKAY OKAY- hahahaha! You’re not a baby! Hahaha-!!” He smacked his hands. “Leheeheheeave my stomach alohohohohne-! HAHAHAHAHAHA-! That tickles-!”

Ash stopped, toppling on him to cuddle.

“Brat..”

“Hush. You’re MY brat.” He laughed.

“No. You’re MINE.” He put his glasses away.

*chuckle*

“So.. did you mean it when you told me you’d take tomorrow off?”

He looked at him with a smile. “Of course. Anything for you, Clem.”

“Great.. now… let’s get some sleep.. I love you.”

“I love you more..”

“I love you the most..”

They hit the lights and went to sleep.

#2 Surprise tickling:

“Alright Pikachu! Iron tail! Talonflame, Flame charge!” Ash exclaimed, pumped up during his early training session.

“Pika! Pikachu!”

“Tal! Flame!”

Clemont was coming out to tell Ash to come inside for dinner. “Hey! Ash! Come on! I’ve got dinner almost ready!”

Ash didn’t hear him. He was way into his training to notice him talking.

“Ash?” He realized he wasn’t listening. “Aaaaaaash!”

He still wasn’t paying any bit of attention.

“Now Pikachu! I want you to use thunderbolt!”

-______-

Clemont rolled his eyes and went back to the house to finish their dinner, after about ten minutes he came back out and yelled for his boyfriend again.

“Hey Ash! It’s time to eat!”

“Talonflame! Use brave bird! Carefully now, don’t get hurt!”

Clemont had enough of yelling, but he tried one more time. “ASH! Time to eat!! Wrap it up!! You and your Pokemon need to eat!”

This time Ash heard him. “Oh! Okay Clem! Be in in a minute!”

Relieved, he went back inside and waited for him. But after another 15 minutes, he stormed back outside to see him still training.

“Dammit, Ash..” He huffed.

Ash does this all of the time. He tires himself and his Pokemon out just about every day training.

Clemont had enough. If he wasn’t going to come in, he’ll make him. He snuck up behind his boyfriend.

“Pikachu, let’s try electro ball against Talonflame’s Ariel ace!”

“Pika!!”

“Tal Tal!”

“Awesome! You guys keep it u-HAHAHAHA!!!”

Pikachu and Talonflame stopped battling and watched as Ash squirmed in Clemont’s arms as he tickled him.

“CLEHEHEHEMENT WHAT THE HEHEHEHELL?! HAHAHAHAHA!!! LET ME GOHOHOHO!”

He smirked. “No! You decided not to listen! You’ve been out here for 3 hours! You and your Pokemon need to eat!”

“I wahahahahahahas gonna cohohohome in Ihihihin a mihihihihinute!!!”

“Too long!” Clemont laughed. “Now face the consequences of your actions, love!”

“Wha- h-hey-!”

“Ash. No. Don’t you dare.”

“Ohoho.. But why not? That was a big mistake babe.. *poke*

Clemont grinned. “Then next time, when I call for you guys to come take a break, you have got to listen. I don’t want you all to go too far and exhaust yourselves.”

“OKAYOKAYOKAY-!”

“OHOHOHOHO MY GOD CLEMONT YOURE SOHOHOHO DEHEHEEHEAD!”

“No training tomorrow. Your Pokemon rest, while you and I have the day to ourselves. Deal?”

“Oh, come up here you big baby.” He laughed.

Clemont just made a mistake. He hid in the covers. “I-I- didn’t say anything! Goodnight babe-!”

“S-Stop!” He squirmed in his arms.

“Nohoho!”

“Okay you brat.. you wanna play like that? C’mere!” He pinned him down and tickled his stomach, poking him repeatedly.

“OKAY OKAY- hahahaha! You’re not a baby! Hahaha-!!” He smacked his hands. “Leheeheheeave my stomach alohohohohne-! HAHAHAHAHAHA-! That tickles-!”
